python-questions.description: Given a string consisting of only alphabets and characters, print the count of the alphabets and numbers respectively. If either count is equal to zero, do not print the corresponding result.
python-questions.inputFormat: A string of alphabets and numbers
python-questions.explanation: In the given string, there are 4 alphabet characters and 4 numeric characters.

python-questions.description: Write a python code to print the position or index of a given character from the given of string.
python-questions.inputFormat: A string of alphabets and numbers and the required character
python-questions.explanation: The character 'G' is present in the 7th position

python-questions.description: Given a string, print the n number of characters from the middle of the string
python-questions.inputFormat: A string of alphabets and numbers and the required number
python-questions.explanation: The middle position is 5 for the string, as such 2 characters from position 5

python-questions.description: Given a list of integers, print all the integers greater than the average of the given integers
python-questions.explanation: Average of the given list = 14. Numbers greater than 14

python-questions.description: Given a set of integers. Calculate the sum of integers present in the odd position in the list and multiplication of integers in the even position
python-questions.explanation: 12 14 and 16 are in odd position, so add them. 13 and 15 are in even postion, so multiply them
